thread.title: New Devart Delphi Data Access Components with a Support for RAD Studio 10 Seattle
thread.title_full: New Devart Delphi Data Access Components with a Support for RAD Studio 10 Seattle

title: New Devart Delphi Data Access Components with a Support for RAD Studio 10 Seattle
text: New Devart Delphi Data Access Components with a Support for RAD Studio 10 Seattle Czech Republic, 11 September 2015 -- Devart released an update for DAC product line with a support for new RAD Studio 10 Seattle, MariaDB, Batch operations and much more.Devart presented new versions of Delphi Data Access Components. An update includes the following new features: - RAD Studio 10 Seatle is supported - Support for INSERT, UPDATE and DELETE batch operations, that may significantly increase performance of huge data modifications - MariaDB Embedded is supported - The trial limitation by 6 columns is removed from the Trial version for Win64 and it becomes a fully-functional Professional Edition Delphi Data Access Components by Devart provide direct access to SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, SQLite, Interbase/Firebird. Universal Data Access Components provide a unified interface to access all mentioned databases. The components enable to develop cross-database client/server applications in Delphi, C++Builder, Lazarus (and Free Pascal) under Windows, Mac OS X, iOS, Android, Linux, and FreeBSD for both 32-bit and 64-bit platforms. Read more about new Data Access Components for Delphi by Devart at the product pages:
